P = P0 * exp( - h*M*g / RT)

P/P0 = exp

ln (P/P0) =  - h*M*g / RT

- RT * ln (P/P0) / M*g =  h 

8.3143 * 288.15 * ln(P/101325) / (0.02896 * 9.807)

2395.765545 * ln[ 1 + (P/101325 - 1) ] / 0.28401072

h = 8435.47576303 * [ (P/101325 - 1) - (P/101325 - 1)^2 / 2 ]

h = 8435.47576303 * [ (P/101325 - 1) - (P^2/101325^2 - 2*P/101325 + 1) / 2 ]

h = 8435.47576303 * [ (P/101325 - 1) - (P^2/101325^2 - 2*P/101325 + 1) / 2 ]

h = 8435.47576303 * (P/101325 - 1) - 8435.47576303 * {(P^2/101325^2 - 2*P/101325 + 1) / 2 }

h = 8435.47576303 * (P/101325 - 1) - 8435.47576303 * {(P^2/101325^2 - 2*P/101325 + 1) / 2 }

h = 0.08325167296 * P - 8435.47576303 - { 8435.47576303 * P^2 / 8.2163013e-7 - 8435.47576303 * P/50662.5 + 8435.47576303 /2 }

h = 0.08325167296 * P - 8435.47576303 - 4217.73788151 * P^2 / 8.2163013e-7 - 4217.73788151 * P/50662.5 + 4217.73788151 

h = 0.08325167296 * P - 5133377815.04 * P^2 - P*0.08 325167296 - 4217.73788152 

######

h = 8435.47576303 * [ (P/101325 - 1) - (P/101325 - 1)^2 / 2 ]

h = 0.08325167296 * P - 8435.47576303 - 8435.47576303 * (P/101325 - 1)^2 / 2
